18-0968.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Tuesday, March 6, 2018.A motion was made by Chair Austin, seconded by Vice Chair Gonzalez, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Richardson, Gonzalez and Austin2.
